Reviews.Content: stayed days boyfriend nice time staff nice clean especially european city hotel located close de transport isnt central

Reviews.Title: “good value for money hotel in a very central location.”
Reviews.Author: kerberBelfast
Reviews.Content: stayed recently 4 nights husband enjoyable time location minutes walk la ramblas able access bus tours etc hotel beside antonio metro stop getting arround hotel basic extremely clean maids day change bed towels disappointed teacoffee facilities breakfast value 8 euros eat set day dinner hotel night tasty reasonably priced restaurant disappointingly quiet reason decided dine elsewhere remainder stay barstaff wernt overly friendly didnt care stayed needless definately stay sake 20 euros airport pointless trying trainsbuses etc

Reviews.Title: “Robbed in my room, hotel staff denied theft...not the first time here”
Reviews.Author: MB600
Reviews.Content: stayed conference feb 2011 day conference house maids 630pm stole 700 euros wallet placing empty wallet bag wouldnt tampered confronted hotel denied claim refused believe theft hotel serious theft issue recommend staying hotel noisy especially night wear earplugs

Reviews.Title: “Good location if you want to relax and tour around”

Reviews.Content: tha hotel close eveything close bad sleep steet noise 5 min walk metro universitat 1 min walk gran via walk ramblas plaza catalunya tha hotel looks hotels photos lot ok bathroom anough hot water unconfortable situation sink didnt pass time didnt complain water didnt easily sink dirty tooth paste tha service polite conclusion recomend hotel fine dont pay fir close touristic bcn city ohh forgot tween beds light weight move lil hard bed moves

Reviews.Title: “Dont believe anything bad people are writing here.. its all lies. i pity those people! it was awesome!!”
Reviews.Author: siemprebarcaxx
Reviews.Content: amazing amazing amazing location incredibly clean service outstanding loved receptionists huge help wish thank speak near native level english dont quality lot people pity communication loved sum phenomenal definately stay highly recommended peace

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: Volga981
Reviews.Content: nice budget hotel stayed night flight gf left day price compared neighboring hotels service corresponds price concierge professional quick perfect command english receive welcome additional materials city received checkin brochure map tours biking etc convenient location price mind reasonable 10 min walk la rambla noticed 5am people outside hear perfectly closed windows windows faced square perfectly clean ronda probably choice found price paid dislike streaks bathtub glass otherwise hotel hotel reasonbly priced wifi

Reviews.Title: “Pity about the Bad Reviews”
Reviews.Author: sootee6
Reviews.Content: husband son returned five day trip barcelona staying ronda hotel read reviews beforehand address negative ones found staff extremely helpful polite basic clean bathroom ate time comment food hotel situated close shops metro covered market la rambla easily walking distance cafe brasil close hotel snacks lovely coffee didnt prices bad staff bus tour excellent value information reception discount ticket price break didnt feel particularly threatened wherever werent late care city

Reviews.Title: “Worse stay ever!”
Reviews.Author: JakobKrag
Reviews.Content: positive write hotel friends arrived hotel 15 hours money gone 600 euros door locked sign damage door maids stealing help reception impossible key key yeah night friend mugged 30 hotel buy wireless internet cancel credit card service hotel middle slum people doing drugs selling outside hotel dont visit hotel ronda

Reviews.Title: “Don't believe all the comments here”
Reviews.Author: VIM48
Reviews.Content: post wasnt expecting experience hotel pleasantly surprised staff reception helpful friendly fairly basic clean hotel placed 2 metro stations convenient didnt eat hotel lot nearby agree cafe brasil outside value

Reviews.Title: “Acceptable for price, in quite a funky area!”
Reviews.Author: iTrailBlazer
Reviews.Content: ok read reviews stayed 5 star hotels hostels world fair assessment lodgings hotel clean tidy relatively modern welcoming staff stayed 6 days including weekend staff welcoming honest barcelona funky roads lit little pubs bars 2am own probably wouldnt walk street 2am cities students fun hotel air con aimed wall wall onto bed little cold bed feet night food ok reccomend eating nearby cafe square outside busy mornings wait eat worth else night true goings square sinister fun walking laugh joke walked passed feel threatened dont stay hope helps id stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel reading reviews fearing worst arrived hotel wife loved location proximity las ramblas port walked streets lot uncomfortable threatened wherever 2 metro stations strolling distance little cafe door hotel breakfast day yes wits major city amazing time hotel bit basic didnt venture restaurant cant comment clean expected price fridge free wifi nice little bit mean hire safe didnt principle feel value money
